document.title: 2010 Conference Abstracts: Annual Undergraduate Research Conference at the Interface of Biology and Mathematics

author.organization: National Institute for Mathematical and Biological Synthesis (NIMBioS)

document.abstract:
Abstract book for the Second Annual Undergraduate Research Conference at the Interface of Biology and Mathematics

Date: November 19 - 20, 2010
Plenary speaker: Abdul-Aziz Yakubu, Professor and Chair of the Department of Mathematics, Howard University
Featured speaker: Jory Weintraub, Assistant Director Education and Outreach, National Evolutionary Synthesis Center
